mapper.insert: insert into customer (cul_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_sex, brithday, tel, address, Comment) values (#{culId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update customer set customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_psd = #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_sex = #{customerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cul_id = #{culId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cul_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_sex, brithday, tel, address, Comment from customer where cul_id = #{culId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cul_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_sex, brithday, tel, address, Comment from customer
